circumstances: After takeoff from Palaly Airport, while climbing, the left engine exploded. The crew declared an emergency and was cleared to return. On short final, the aircraft went out of control and crashed in a huge explosion about 200 metres short of runway. All 45 occupants were killed, among them 40 soldiers and two civilians.
probable_cause: It was determined that the left engine exploded during climbout after being hit by a surface-to-air missile shot by Tamil separatists.
